verses.verse: Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> out of the <S%H1710>fish<s%>'s <S%H4578>belly.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7121>called<s%> because of my <S%H6869>affliction<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H990>me.<s%> Out of the belly of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> I <S%H7768>cried.<s%> You <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

For you <S%H7993>threw<s%> me into the <S%H4688>depths,<s%> in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%> The <S%H5104>flood<s%> was all <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H1530>me.<s%> All your waves and your <S%H4867>billows<s%> passed over <S%H5674>me.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1644><s%> 'I have been banished from your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> yet I will <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>'

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H5315>me,<s%> even to the soul. The <S%H8415>deep<s%> was <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H5488>me.<s%> The weeds were wrapped <S%H2280>around<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7095>bottoms<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1280>barred<s%> me in <S%H5769>forever:<s%> yet have you brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

"When my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> within <S%H2142>me,<s%> I remembered <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> My <S%H8605>prayer<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6944>you,<s%> into your holy <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

But I will <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to you with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%> I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> that which I have <S%H5087>vowed.<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%> belongs to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1709>fish,<s%> and it vomited <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H3124><s%> on the dry <S%H3004>land.<s%>
